featured.text: Dumas’s two most famous stories, The Three Musketeers and The Count of Monte Cristo, have inspired more than 100 films.

definition.zh_def: 基督，指耶穌基督，基督教的中心人物和信仰的基礎。
definition.en_def: Christ, referring to Jesus Christ, the central figure of Christianity and the foundation of the faith.
definition.example: Many people around the world celebrate Christmas to honor the birth of Christ.
